alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lackawanna and southwestern Wayne Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elmhurst, or near Scranton, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Dunmore, Old Forge, Archbald, Blakely, Taylor, Dickson City, Moosic, Olyphant and Clarks Summit. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 180 and 194. Interstate 84 between 1 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 near 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
